entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow and blizzard. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then periods of light snow. Blowing snow late this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 8:12 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:12 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
